mapper.sql: staff_id, staff_name, staff_sex, staff_age, staff_phone, staff_idntityCardID, staff_birthday, staff_positionID, staff_adress, staff_wage, staff_email, staff_depID
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM oas_staff a left join oas_department b on a.staff_depID = b.dep_id) a left join oas_position b on a.staff_positionID = b.position_id) a left join oas_staffpower b on a.staff_id = b.sp_staffID)a left join oas_power b on a.sp_powerID = b.power_id where a.staff_id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM oas_staff a left join oas_department b on a.staff_depID = b.dep_id) a left join oas_position b on a.staff_positionID = b.position_id) a left join oas_staffpower b on a.staff_id = b.sp_staffID)a left join oas_power b on a.sp_powerID = b.power_id
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update oas_staff
staff_name = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_sex = #{staffSex,jdbcType=CHAR},
staff_age = #{staffAge,jdbcType=TINYINT},
staff_phone = #{staffPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_idntityCardID = #{staffIdntitycardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_birthday = #{staffBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
staff_positionID = #{position.positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
staff_adress = #{staffAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_wage = #{staffWage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_email = #{staffEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_depID = #{department.depId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update oas_staff set staff_name = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_sex = #{staffSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, staff_age = #{staffAge,jdbcType=TINYINT}, staff_phone = #{staffPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_idntityCardID = #{staffIdntitycardid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_birthday = #{staffBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, staff_positionID = #{position.positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, staff_adress = #{staffAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_wage = #{staffWage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_email = #{staffEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_depID = #{department.depId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT dep_managerid from oas_staff LEFT JOIN oas_department ON staff_depID=dep_id where staff_id=#{sid};
SELECT position_name,dep_name FROM oas_staff LEFT JOIN oas_position ON staff_positionID= position_id LEFT JOIN oas_department ON staff_depID=oas_department.dep_id where staff_id=#{sid}
